ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.vertex

Interface IRestrictedVertex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRestrictedGraphItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IVertex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GravisVertex, RestrictedVertex

    public interface IRestrictedVertex
extends IRestrictedGraphItem
    This interface gives restricted access to additional vertex methods. Only getter methods are accessable.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getHeight()
      Returns the height of this vertex.
      Point2D getLocation()
      Returns the location of this vertex.
      double getWidth()
      Returns the width of this vertex.
      boolean isEnd()
      Returns true if this is the end vertex.
      boolean isStart()
      Returns true if this is the start vertex.

      • Methods inherited from interface ch.bfh.ti.gravis.core.graph.item.IRestrictedGraphItem

        appendComment, getCurrentResult, getCurrentState, getName, getNewComment, getNewResult, getNewState, getValue, isActivated, isDiscarded, isDone, isInitial, isNewDashed, isNewTagged, isNewVisible, isSolved, isStateCommentEnabled, isVisited, resetHelperVariables, setDone, setNewComment, setNewDashed, setNewResult, setNewState, setNewTagged, setNewVisible, setStateCommentEnabled, setValue
